questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to Radimus Erkle in the Legends' Guild. (Chat 4•✓)
itemsRecommended: Any boosts you wish to use to start the quest
additionalStepInformation: Fairy Ring BLR or Legends Cape to teleport to the Legends Guild.

questSteps.stepDescription: In Taverley, talk to Ivy Sophista in the house west of the summoning obelisk. (Chat 1•4)
Go upstairs and talk to Thaerisk Cemphier. Kill both assassins that appear.
Talk to Thaerisk again. (Chat 1•2•2•3•4)
Talk to Reldo in the Varrock Library.(Chat 4•1•2•3•4)
additionalStepInformation: If Desperate Times is completed, you need to choose one more chat option before proceed the aforementioned quest dialogue. (Chat 2•4•1•2•3•4)

questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to the Hunting expert in Feldip Hunter area and ask about tracking down a person. (Chat 5•2•3•4) Her location is in Additional Information.
itemsNeeded: Logs of any type ( except Acadia )
One of each Rune - Air, Mind, Water, Earth, Fire ( Bring a couple just in case )
6 Free Inventory Spaces ( More is Preferred )
additionalStepInformation: She is north of Oo'glog lodestone, or south-west of fairy ring AKS. After the conversation she will give you a mort myre fungus.

questSteps.stepDescription: Go west and create a pitfall trap at a square trap pit, then use your mort myre fungus on the trap.
additionalStepInformation: If you go to the larupia pit falls, go to your other west.

questSteps.stepDescription: Dismantle the collapsed trap to obtain an unconscious broav.
Talk to the Hunting expert. (Chat 5)
Dismiss any followers you might have before proceeding to the west of Fight Arena and into the laundry room two houses north of the pub.
With your ring of charos (a) equipped, talk to the Khazard launderer to obtain dirty laundry. (Chat 2•2)
additionalStepInformation: If you brought coins instead, take them out of your coin pouch and use them on the launderer. (Chat 2•1)

questSteps.stepDescription: Go to the Khazard Battleground north-west (north of Tree Gnome Village and across the bridges).
Climb-over the crumbled wall inside the north-westernmost building.
Drop your Broav in the room with the broken table then use the dirty laundry on him.
Go through the door, and follow the path to the north, then climb down the stairs.
Search the door and find the correct rune to use on it. After you enter the correct rune, you hear a click.
Search the door again, and you will find a trap to disarm. (Chat 1)
additionalStepInformation: Boost your thieving level if needed.

questSteps.stepDescription: Go through the old battered door. Image of what each rune to represented Letter is at this step.
additionalStepInformation: "Prohibited" is the key indicating which rune to use. In the game, only one letter will be affected.
(O) = Mind rune
(H) = Earth Rune
(E) = Air Rune ( Upwards E )
(E) = Fire Rune ( Aggressive E )
(D) = Water Rune

questSteps.stepDescription: Search the painting on the east wall (Chat 1).
Search bookcases until you receive the chat response CLICK!.
Follow the wire that faintly glows to the next bookshelf.
additionalStepInformation: Search that bookshelf.
Repeat, searching each bookshelf until the electricity on the gate disappears.

questSteps.stepDescription: Open the gate and right-click search the spiral staircase to disarm the trap, then climb up.
Search the desk to obtain Movario's notes (volume 1)
additionalStepInformation: Read the notes.

questSteps.stepDescription: Pick-up the waste-paper basket.
additionalStepInformation: With Movario's notes in your backpack, search the basket.

questSteps.stepDescription: Search the bookcase to the west of the trash can.
additionalStepInformation: Use the ruby key on the bookcase.
Climb-up the stairs just north of you.

questSteps.stepDescription: Search the bed.
additionalStepInformation: Use the ruby key on the bed chest.
Search the bed chest to disarm the traps (Chat 1)
Open and search it.

questSteps.stepDescription: Climb back down twice to the wire room and in the small east room, search the drawers.
Pick-up your Broav and look-at the thermometer. Note down the number it says. Read Additional Information for the needed details .
additionalStepInformation: If you weigh more than the number: subtract the number from the thermometer from your character's weight to get the result number.
If you weigh less than the number: subtract your character's weight from the number from to get the result number.
For example if the thermometer says 20 and you weigh 30 kg, you would need 10 kg.
All in all you need to distribute your weight evenly.

questSteps.stepDescription: Pick up your Broav if you haven't already otherwise it will mess with the numbers.
On the floor of this room is a pile of weights. Right-click take weights equalling the result number you got.
additionalStepInformation: CAUTION: You will not be able to recover any items dropped in this room.

questSteps.stepDescription: Look in Additional Info before climbing back up the spiral staircase.
additionalStepInformation: If you weigh more than the number: Use all the weights on the statue just north of you. Open the door just east.
If you weigh less than the number: keep the weights in your inventory and open the door east of the statue.
Solving this part successfully gives the chat response "The magical interference to teleportation has lifted.."
If you are having trouble with this part, check to make sure you aren't wearing weight reducing equipment such as Boots of lightness, un-equip, and try again.

questSteps.stepDescription: Head east through the door and up the ladder to leave the hideout.
Return to Thaerisk in Taverley with the items obtained in Movario's base. (Chat 2•5)
Head to the building in McGrubor's Wood, and a cutscene will start. Kill all the mercenaries.
additionalStepInformation: Fairy Ring ALS will get you there the quickest.

questSteps.stepDescription: Search the dead mercenaries and talk to the wounded Guardian of Armadyl.
Go upstairs in the Seers' Village pub and talk to Idria. (Chat 1•3)
Talk to Sir Tiffy Cashien in the Falador Park. (Chat 1)
additionalStepInformation: (Chat 2) if Slug Menace hasn't been completed.

questSteps.stepDescription: Go to the White Knight's Castle.
In the eastern room on the 1st floor[US], talk to Akrisae. (Chat 3•1)
At Draynor Village, use the teleorb on the shady stranger wearing white robes and near the shore. This may take several attempts.
Go back to Falador and talk to Akrisae in the White Knight's Castle. Cutscene plays
If you don't have a snapdragon seed, buy one from Thaerisk. (Chat 2•1)
Talk to Thaerisk to teleport to Port Sarim. (Chat 3)
Talk to Betty in the Port Sarim magic shop for truth serum. (Chat 1•1)
Talk to her again for pink dye. (Chat 3•2)
additionalStepInformation: If the snapdragon seed isn't already on the counter, talk to her again until she places the seed on the counter.

questSteps.stepDescription: Use the pink dye on your lantern lens.
Stand just inside the doorway, use the lens with the counter and take the enriched snapdragon seed.
additionalStepInformation: If not already, switch to the Lunar spellbook.

questSteps.stepDescription: Return to White Knight's Castle in Falador and speak to Thaerisk. (Chat 1•3)
Using the most western staircase, head to the top of the castle and plant the seed in the herb patch.
Go back downstairs and talk to Thaerisk. (Chat 1)
Cast NPC Contact to talk to the following people in Additional Information. (Chat 1) for all
additionalStepInformation: Turael
Duradel
Mazchna

questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to Hazelmere upstairs in the hut east of Yanille near fairy ring CLS.
Pick the enriched snapdragon at the top of west tower at White Knights' Castle and mix it into your truth serum for a super truth serum.
Head back to the room with Thaerisk and the others.
Open and search the cupboard to find charcoal and papyrus.
Go into the cell and use the serum on the Shady Stranger. (Chat ~)
additionalStepInformation: The correct chat option varies from player to player. Exhaust chat options until you reach the correct one.

questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to the spy, then talk to Idria.
Cast NPC Contact to talk to Cyrisus. (Chat 1)
Head to the Warriors' Guild and talk to the following NPC's in Additional Information. (Chat 1)
additionalStepInformation: Ghommal - Just outside (Chat 1)
Harrallak Menarous - In the main lobby (Chat 1)
Sloane - Upstairs (Chat 1)

questSteps.stepDescription: Return and speak to Idria, then Akrisae.
This step is all about preparation as the steps ahead will be full of fun.
itemsNeeded: Runes for Any Charge Orb Spell
Items to Enter Black Knights Fortress
Two Weapons for Two Combat Styles (Mellee and Range Recommended)
itemsRecommended: Elite Black Knight Armour to Save Time (Buy from G.E)
Refer to Additional Information if Elite Black Knight Armour was bought.
Combat Familiar that uses a different style than yourself
additionalStepInformation: You will need 10 free inventory slots to proceed unless you bought the Elite Black Knight Armour from the Grand Exchange.
Once you have a set of Elite Black Knight armour, you will need 9 free inventory slots to proceed.
If you have purchased Elite Black Knight armour, you do not need combat gear, but some food is still advised.
Switch back to the standard spellbook.

questSteps.stepDescription: Equip your disguise and head inside Black Knights' Fortress with all the items in the previous step or use the skull of remembrance to teleport to the ritual chamber, and make your way down to the 1st floor[US].
Climb down the ladder in the south-west corner.
Along the east wall, right-click search the floor tile. Cast your charge orb spell on it.
Climb-down the trapdoor.
Kill Elite Black Knights to obtain a helmet, platebody and platelegs if you don't have a set already. Equip the full set to remove their aggression.
additionalStepInformation: This can be Skipped if Elite Black Knights Armour was bought from the Grand Exchange.

questSteps.stepDescription: Head north by jumping across the broken bridge, go east, and climb up the wall.
Jump over the barricade and walk north-west until you reach a fork in the path, then head east.
Talk to Silif in the northmost cell. (Chat 1•2•3)
Go back west and enter the northern centre door.
Search all desks and wardrobes in the room for the items in Additional Information. Right-Click is your best friend. Take any Food Eating or Restore potions off your keybinds just incase.
additionalStepInformation: Another set of Elite Black Knights Armour.
Full set of Dagon'hai Robes.
Restore potion (4) (Do not drink the restore potion)
Strange teleorb
Lobster dont accidently eat it. If you do any kind of cooked food will work.

questSteps.stepDescription: Search the key rack on the northern wall (a few tiles east of the wardrobe) for a cell key.
Enter Silif's cell. Use the piece of food on Silif then the potion. (Chat 2)
Give Silif a set of elite black armour and dismiss any familiar.
Return to the northern room. Walk to the map on the southern wall then talk to Silif.
Plant the teleorb on Dark Squall, who is located in the east of the room, then escape back to Falador.
Read Additional Information then talk to Akrisae. (Chat 1•2•3)
additionalStepInformation: In these steps ahead, there is a brief encounter in the Wilderness, where it is possible to encounter danger from creatures and/or events.
Therefore, carrying food and defensive armour is recommended.

questSteps.stepDescription: Wear your Dagon'hai robes and enter the nearby jail cell.
Climb up the ladder in the north-eastern corner, stand in the stone circle in the middle of the room, and activate the strange teleorb.
additionalStepInformation: Note: Activation will fail if the required runes are in a pouch.

questSteps.stepDescription: Follow the north-eastern path towards the chapel and climb up the ice wall. There is a stick in the ice wall to indicate where to climb.
Jump across to the ledge on the chapel into the Wilderness.
Walk east to activate a cutscene.
Return to Falador after the cutscene.
Talk to Idria.
additionalStepInformation: If she won't talk about Movario and instead keeps saying to investigate Lucien's Base, then unfortunately the game glitched and you must go back and rewatch the cutscene.
Remember to bring the strange teleorb, a law rune, and a death rune.
A good indicator that the cutscene registered is to check for the "You have unlocked a new music track: The Evil Within" game message.

questSteps.stepDescription: Go to the Tears of Guthix cavern.
itemsNeeded: Enough Inventory Space to Unequip Everything your wearing + 6 Inventory Spaces
additionalStepInformation: Bringing Two full Druid Pouches can be replaced with the Prayer potion.

questSteps.stepDescription: Equip your Dagon'hai robes and talk to Movario. (Chat 3•1•3)
With a sapphire lantern lit, right-click travel into cavern with a light creature.
Right-click search the northernmost skeleton for a silver sickle (b) and 6 druid pouches.
Right-click search the rocks (Chat 1) in the north-eastern corner. Then right-click search on the brazier that appears, choosing the chisel option to receive a fire orb.
Repeat on the north-west rock for the earth orb.
Repeat for the standing lit braziers for air and water orbs in the south-western and south-eastern corners.
Head further south to reach three skull cavities on the southern wall. Examine each recessed block and use the respective orb on the block.
Climb up the wall twice and use the water orb on the recessed block.
Jump down the same way you came up. For each of the three lower skulls, enter its nose cavity.
Dismiss any followers and empty both your main and off-hand slots before entering the cavities.
Crawl along the tunnel in each cavity to its end. Examine the door there and insert the respective element key into the door lock. Crawl back through the tunnel and exit the skull.
Climb up the walls to the upper skull. Use the fire key on the skull's recessed block, then right-click search the stone cube in front of the skull.
Climb-through the cave opening to enter the Ancient Guthix Temple.
There are eight statues in this temple. Each, when examined, will reveal what type of potion must be "made" at that statue.
additionalStepInformation: You will now need at least two free inventory slots, though more can make it quicker to proceed. Ensure that you have also deactivated any sign of the porter effects.

questSteps.stepDescription: Use your druid pouches on the druid spirits.
additionalStepInformation: Each will drop required ingredients for the statues once - if these are lost (e.g. by dropping and letting them timeout), you will have to get replacements yourself.
Grace of the Elves will send items to the bank so unequip.
Do not let your druid pouch empty completely else it disappears! You need 3 open inventory slots to add (3) Flowers into the druid pouch.

questSteps.stepDescription: Use the herbs and the secondary ingredients on the various statues referencing the image at this step. Not all keywords will be on statues.
additionalStepInformation: If you have an ouroboros pouch, you do not need to worry about the druid pouch losing charges. However, you must carry a druid pouch in your inventory to "use" it on the spirits, though it will never deplete.
If you need to refill your druid pouch, right-click bloom with your silver sickle near dead vines to get flowers.
These can be used to refill the druid pouch.
If you received a mort myre fungus from the druids, use it with the correct statue or drop it for a moment before filling the druid pouch else you will lose it!

questSteps.stepDescription: Use the dolmens you receive from the statues on the Stone Table in the middle of the temple. It will open the huge door in front of it.
Make whatever arrangements necessary to battle the level 102 Balance Elemental that can use all three combat styles, and lower your combat stats.
additionalStepInformation: You can leave the area to get supplies, but always bring your lit sapphire lantern.
Don't forget to bring at least two combat styles for the tormented demon fight.
The Balance Elemental drains combat stats during the fight, so be sure to bring at least one full super restore.

questSteps.stepDescription: Proceed down the corridor and enter a large chamber.
Once ready, search the mysterious stone (Chat 1) and kill the Balance Elemental that appears.
Search the mysterious stone again for a cutscene. Doing so boosts all your combat stats to level 255 except Prayer.
Continue dialogue with Movario (Chat 1•2•3•4), then with Lucien. (Chat 1•2•3)
Kill the two Tormented demons, switching between your two combat styles.
Talk to Idria to have her teleport you to Falador. (Chat 1)
Continue dialogue with Idria in Falador.
Quest complete!

questDetails.StartPoint: Speak to Radimus Erkle at the Legends' Guild, located in the north-east of Ardougne.
Requirements: Ability to enter the Warriors' Guild
ItemsRequired: Three air runes, an earth rune, a fire rune, a water rune, a mind rune, a law rune, and a death rune
A log (any type except acadia logs)
Equipment to enter the Black Knights' Fortress
Runes to cast NPC Contact spell four times
Runes for any charge orb spell
Equipment for two different attack styles
Either a snapdragon seed or 100 coins to buy one
Recommended: Completion of Nature Spirit for druid pouch or ouroboros pouch
Multiple Falador teletabs or ring of respawn
Runes to cast NPC Contact spell three additional times
A set of elite black armour
Ingredients for a Guthix balance potion
EnemiesToDefeat: 2 Tormented demon (level 119; stats boosted extremely high)
